field.label: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the names of any sponsors and/or funding codes in the box.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: One: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the title of the project as given in the letter of award of the project.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this project.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Summarizes the characteristics of the project according to the abstract given in the letter of award of the project.
field.required: You must enter an abstract

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Provide keywords describing the project. Use at least the keywords as given in the letter of award of the project.
field.required: You must enter keywords for the project.

field.label: Information link
field.hint: URL or other link to more information on the resource. The value domain is free text, but should consist of the URL to the project page on ams-institute.org (if it exists) or other reference to an external information page or system.

field.label: Date issued
field.hint: The start date of the project as given in the letter of award of the project. Please provide at least year and month.

field.label: Source URI
field.hint: If exists, URI to a project-own webpage. This is not the same as the information link, which is the AMS project page.

field.label: Related Projects
field.hint: The project(s) related to this project. Please provide the identifier if known (e.g. 10673/59390), or if not known or existint yet please describe the project.

field.label: Related Tools
field.hint: Tool(s) that have been used or made in the context of the project. Please provide the identifier if known known (e.g. 10673/59388), or if not known or existing yet, please describe the tool.

field.label: Related Publications
field.hint: Publication(s) that have been produced in the scope of this project. Please provide the identifier if known (e.g. 10673/49000), or if not known or existing yet, please describe the publication.

field.label: Related Datasets
field.hint: Dataset(s) that are related with this project. Please provide the identifier if known (e.g. 10673/59375), or if not known or existing yet, please describe the dataset.

field.label: Item custodian
field.hint: The party or person, and its contact information, that specified the metadata information of this project. The value domain of this element is free text and should contain name, email and phone number.
field.required: You must indicate the contact information of the item custodian.

field.label: Type of item (predefined)
field.hint: Predefined field
field.required: This field is predefined

field.label: Project leader
field.hint: Name, position, organization of the project leader(s). The value domain of this element is free text and should contain name, position and organization, e.g. "John Happyhill, senior analyst, ACompany".
field.required: You must specify the project leader of this project.

field.label: Project members
field.hint: Name, position and organization of the project member(s). The value domain of this element is free text and should contain name, position and organization.
field.required: You must specify the project members of this project.

field.label: Project partners
field.hint: Names of the involved parties within this project as specified in the letter of award.
field.required: You must specify the project partners of this project.

field.label: Project contact
field.hint: Contact information of the project contact person. The value domain of this element is free text and should contain name, email and phone number, e.g. "John Happyhill, j.happyhill@acompany.com, +31612341234"
field.required: You must specify the contact information for this project.

field.label: Project duration
field.hint: The time period that the project has or will be running. Please provide this with a start date and end date, at least month and year, as stated in the letter of award of the project.
field.required: You must enter the time period that the project has or will be running.

field.label: Project Geographical Focus Area
field.hint: The geographical study area of the project in terms of geographical naming, e.g. "The city centre of Amsterdam". The value domain of this element is free text.
field.required: You must enter the geographical study area of the project such as "The city centre of Amsterdam".

field.label: AMS theme
field.hint: The AMS theme(s) to which this project is related. Can be more than one. Themes are prefixed: "Connected City", "Vital City", "Circular City".
field.required: You must select the AMS theme(s) to which this project is related.

field.label: AMS subtheme
field.hint: The AMS subtheme(s) to which this project is related. Can be more than one.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the title of the tool.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Summarizes the characteristics of the tool.
field.required: You must enter an abstract

field.label: Information link
field.hint: URL or other link to more information on the tool. The value domain is free text, but should only consist of a URL or other reference to an extern information page or system.

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Describe the tool with appropriate keywords.
field.required: You must enter keywords for the tool.

field.label: Date issued
field.hint: The date on which the tool was published for the first time. Please provide at least year and month.

field.label: Date created
field.hint: The date on which the tool was originally created. Please provide at least year and month.

field.label: Access information
field.hint: Describe how the tool can be accessed. Especially when the tool cannot be accessed directly, please describe accurately how one can start working with it.
field.required: You must enter the instructions on how to access the tool.

field.label: Source URI
field.hint: If exists, URI to where the tool can be downloaded. This is not the same as the information link, which is the information about the tool.

field.label: Related Projects
field.hint: The project(s) related to this tool. Please provide the identifier if known (e.g. 10673/59390), or if not known or existing yet, please describe the project.
field.required: You must specify the project this tool is related to.

field.label: Related Tools
field.hint: Tool(s) that have been used or made with or based on this tool. Please provide the identifier if known (e.g. 10673/59388), or if not known or existing yet, please describe the tool.

field.label: Related Publications
field.hint: Publication(s) that are related to this tool. Please provide the identifier if known (e.g. 10673/49000), or if not known or existing yet, please describe the publication.

field.label: Related Datasets
field.hint: Dataset(s) that are related with this tool. Please provide the identifier if known (e.g. 10673/59375), or if not known or existing yet, please describe the dataset.

field.label: Item custodian
field.hint: The party or person, and its contact information, that specified the metadata information of this tool. The value domain of this element is free text and should contain name, email and phone number.
field.required: You must indicate the contact information of the item custodian.

field.label: Type of item (predefined)
field.hint: Predefined field
field.required: This field is predefined

field.label: Access level
field.hint: Whether this tool is open, privileged or restricted.
field.required: You must indicate the access level of the tool.

field.label: Source type
field.hint: Whether this tool has been generated by AMS, by a Partner or Harvested.
field.required: You must indicate the source of the tool.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this publication.
field.required: You must enter at least the first author of this publication.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Summarizes the characteristics of the tool.
field.required: Provide a summary of the publication. If exists, use the abstract that is provided by the authors.

field.label: Information link
field.hint: URL or other link to more information on the publication. The value domain is free text, but should only consist of a URL or other reference to an extern information page or system.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases. Preferably, provide the keywords given by the authors of the publication.

field.label: Date issued
field.hint: The date on which the publication was published. Please provide at least year and month.

field.label: Date created
field.hint: The date on which the publication was originally created. Please provide at least year and month.

field.label: Publication own URI
field.hint: If exists, URI to where the publication can be accessed and downloaded. This is not the same as the information link, which is the information about the publication.

field.label: Related Projects
field.hint: The project(s) related to this publication. Please provide the identifier if known (e.g. 10673/59390), or if not known or existing yet, please describe the project.
field.required: You must specify the project this publication is related to.

field.label: Related Tools
field.hint: Tool(s) that are related to the publication. Please provide the identifier if known (e.g. 10673/59388), or if not known or existing yet, please describe the tool.

field.label: Related Publications
field.hint: Publication(s) that are related to this publication. Please provide the identifier if known (e.g. 10673/49000), or if not known or existing yet, please describe the publication.

field.label: Related Datasets
field.hint: Dataset(s) that are related with this publication. Please provide the identifier if known (e.g. 10673/59375), or if not known or existing yet, please describe the dataset.

field.label: Item custodian
field.hint: The party or person, and its contact information, that specified the metadata information of this publication. The value domain of this element is free text and should contain name, email and phone number.
field.required: You must indicate the contact information of the item custodian.

field.label: Type of item (predefined)
field.hint: Predefined field
field.required: This field is predefined

field.label: Publication type
field.hint: The type of the publication, such as "Scientific Paper", "Student Thesis Report", "News article", etc.
field.required: You must speficy the type of publication.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter a title for the dataset.
field.required: You must enter a title for this dataset.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Summarizes the characteristics of the data. This abstract is free text and may include any information, like for example information on the lineage of the data, the purpose of the data and the content of the data.
field.required: You must enter an abstract for the dataset.

field.label: Information link
field.hint: URL or other link to more information on the resource. The value domain is free text, but should only consist of a URL or other reference to an extern information page or system.

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Describe the dataset using subject keywords, e.g. "Amsterdam", "households", "drink water" and "consumption" for a dataset representing the drink water consumptions of households in Amsterdam.
field.required: You must enter keywords for the dataset.

field.label: Date issued
field.hint: The date on which the dataset was published for the first time. Please provide at least year and month.

field.label: Date created
field.hint: The date on which the dataset was originally created. Please provide at least year and month.

field.label: Access information
field.hint: Describe how the dataset can be accessed. Especially when the dataset cannot be accessed directly, please describe accurately what one must do to get it.
field.required: You must enter the instructions on how to access the dataset.

field.label: Source URI
field.hint: Where the data is available for download.

field.label: Related Projects
field.hint: The project(s) related to this dataset. Please provide the identifier if known (e.g. 10673/59390), or if not known or existing yet, please describe the project.
field.required: You must enter the AMS project that uses this dataset.

field.label: Related Tools
field.hint: Tool(s) that use or work with this dataset. Please provide the identifier if known (e.g. 10673/59388), or if not known or existing yet, please describe the tool.

field.label: Related Publications
field.hint: Publication(s) that are related to this dataset. Please provide the identifier if known (e.g. 10673/49000), or if not known or existing yet, please describe the publication.

field.label: Related Datasets
field.hint: Dataset(s) that are related with this dataset. Please provide the identifier if known (e.g. 10673/59375), or if not known or existing yet, please describe the dataset.

field.label: Item custodian
field.hint: The party or person, and its contact information, that specified the metadata information of this data. The value domain of this element is free text and should contain name, email and phone number.
field.required: You must indicate the contact information of the item custodian.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Predefined field
field.required: This field is predefined

field.label: Access level
field.hint: Whether this dataset is open, privileged or restricted.
field.required: You must indicate the access level of the dataset.

field.label: Source type
field.hint: Whether this dataset has been generated by AMS, by a Partner or Harvested.
field.required: You must indicate the source type of the datase.

field.label: Geographic bounds
field.hint: The spatial extent of the dataset in terms of geographical coordinates (x,y) describing the minimum and maximum values of x and y in the coordinate system specified by ‘spatial reference system’, i.e. defining (xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax).

field.label: Period
field.hint: The time period that the dataset covers given as start date and end date, i.e. defining (startdate, enddate). The dates should preferably both be according to the ISO 8601 standard ('yyyy-mm-dd').
field.required: You must enter the time period that the dataset covers.

field.label: Geographical description
field.hint: The spatial extent of the dataset in terms of geographical naming, e.g. "The city centre of Amsterdam". The value domain of this element is free text.
field.required: You must enter the extent of the dataset such as "The city centre of Amsterdam".

field.label: Type
field.hint: Specify whether the dataset is spatial or not.

field.label: Temporal representation type
field.hint: Specifies whether the data represents the spatial data in time. Can be 'dynamic' (variation in time) or 'static' (no time involved). If type 'dynamic' is chosen, metadata elements 'Temporal reference system' and 'Temporal resolution' are mandatory.

field.label: Distribution format
field.hint: In what file format is the data available for distribution, e.g. .txt for tables or for spatial vector data Shapefile, TAB or something else, and for raster data GeoTIFF, ASCII or something else.

field.label: Data value units
field.hint: Provide what the data measurement units are of the dataset or describe well where this information can be found.
field.required: You must enter the data measurement value units.

field.label: Coordinate reference system
field.hint: A description of the coordinate reference system used by the dataset (only applicable in case of a spatial dataset), e.g. the coordinate system WGS84 or the projection. The value domain of this element is free text.

field.label: Spatial resolution
field.hint: The spatial resolution or level of detail in the spatial dimension. In case of raster data this must be expressed as the raster cell size. In case of vector data, the data importer must specify what the level of detail is. The value domain of this element is free text.

field.label: Temporal reference system
field.hint: Time reference system used by the dataset. Mandatory if Temporal representation type is 'dynamic'. The value domain of this element is free text.

field.label: Temporal resolution
field.hint: The time interval or level of detail in the time dimension. Mandatory if Temporal representation type is 'dynamic'. The value domain of this element is free text.

field.label: Update frequency
field.hint: The time-interval in with this dataset normally is be updated. The value domain of this element is free text and for example: 'yearly', 'monthly', 'every 16 days'.

field.label: Language
field.hint: The language that is used in the resource to form textual data.
field.required: You must specify the language of the dataset.

field.label: License
field.hint: The license the dataset is released with.
field.required: You must indicate under what license the dataset is released.

field.label: Data creator
field.hint: The party or person, and its contact information, that was or still is responsible for the creation of the data. The value domain of this element is free text and should contain name, organization, contact email and phone number.
field.required: You must indicate the contact information of the data creator.

field.label: Data provider
field.hint: The party or person, and its contact information, that provides access and usage of the data. The value domain of this element is free text and should contain name, organization, contact email and phone number.
field.required: You must indicate the contact information of the data provider.

field.label: Other parties
field.hint: Other parties that are somehow related to this data. They could for example be the producers or funders for this data. For each party, its role and contact information should be given. The value domain of this element is free text.
